matrixops.maths

Class Fraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • matrixops.maths.Fraction

  • public class Fraction
extends java.lang.Object
    Fraction.java: Fraction structure using BigIntegers for denominators and numerators. Automatically reduces to lowest possible denominator. Can perform basic arithmetic functions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fraction(int numerator)
      Creates a new Fraction from one int value as the numerator.

      Checks if this Fraction equals 0.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fraction

        Fraction(int numerator)
        Creates a new Fraction from one int value as the numerator. Denominator is always 1 in this case.
        Parameters:
        numerator - Numerator of the new Fraction.

    • Method Detail

      • fromString

        public static Fraction fromString(java.lang.String fractionString)
        Constructs a Fraction from a String object. String must be composed of numbers and (optionally) a forward slash.
        Parameters:
        fractionString - String from which to construct Fraction.
        Returns:
        New Fraction constructed from a String.

      • add

        public Fraction add(Fraction b)
        Adds this Fraction to another.
        Parameters:
        b - Second term in the addition.
        Returns:
        Sum of this and b.

      • subtract

        public Fraction subtract(Fraction b)
        Subtracts another Fraction from this.
        Parameters:
        b - The subtrahend of the subtraction.
        Returns:
        Difference between this and b.

      • multiply

        public Fraction multiply(Fraction b)
        Multiplies this Fraction with another.
        Parameters:
        b - Second factor in the multiplication.
        Returns:
        Product of this and b.

      • divide

        public Fraction divide(Fraction b)
        Divides this Fraction by another through multiplication with inverted Fraction.
        Parameters:
        b - Divisor in the division.
        Returns:
        Quotient of this and b.

      • square

        public Fraction square()
        Gets the square of this Fraction by multiplying it by itself.
        Returns:
        Square of this.

      • negate

        public Fraction negate()
        Gets the negative of this Fraction by changing the sign of the numerator.
        Returns:
        This Fraction, with its sign changed.

      • equalsOne

        public boolean equalsOne()
        Checks if this Fraction equals 1.
        Returns:
        True if this = 1, otherwise false.

      • equalsZero

        public boolean equalsZero()
        Checks if this Fraction equals 0.
        Returns:
        True if this = 0, otherwise false.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Produces as String representation of this Fraction.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String form of numerator if denominator is 1, otherwise numerator / denominator.
